headline.main: SYRIA PRESIDENT BIDS ARABS AID THE ALLIES; He Says Duty Now Is to Help and Prove Their Fitness

lead_paragraph: DAMASCUS, Syria, Nov. 7 -- King George VI's message of congratulations to Syria on the attainment of independence was described yesterday by the Syrian President, Sheikh Taj Eddin Hassani, as bearing great diplomatic significance.

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: GEORGE VI, KING OF GT BRIT AND IRELAND

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
